intro: Modecca, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its velvety, colorful foliage and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in low light conditions and prefers well-draining soil. Modecca is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
